name: notion-imdb
description: An integration between Notion and TMDB

scripts.build: npm run build --workspaces && rm -rf dist && node support/build.js
scripts.code:deploy: cd dist && npm prune --workspace backend --omit dev && zip -r out.zip . && az functionapp deployment source config-zip -g notion-tmdb-fr -n notion-tmdb-fr --src out.zip
scripts.infra:deploy: az deployment group create --mode complete -g notion-tmdb-fr -f azure/template.bicep

author: michelsalib@gmail.com
